documentation:
--- modus-progress-bar-storybook-docs.mdx --- import { Anchor } from '@storybook/addon-docs'; # Progress Bar --- [Modus Progress Bar](https://modus.trimble.com/components/web/progress-bars/) web components display the completion progress of a task. They are referenced using the `` custom HTML element. ### Default
### Small
### Compact
### Indeterminate
```html ``` ### Properties | Name | Description | Type | Default Value | Required | | ------------------ | ----------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | ---------------------------- | -------- | | `aria-label` | The progress bar's aria-label | `string` | | | | `background-color` | The bar's background color | `string` | `#FFFFFF` (Trimble White) | | | `color` | The bar's color | `string` | `#005F9E` (Trimble Blue Mid) | | | `max-value` | The maximum value | `number` | `100` | | | `mode` | The progress bar's mode | `'determinate'`, `'indeterminate'` | `determinate` | | | `min-value ` | The minimum value | `number` | `0` | | | `size` | The size of the bar | `'default'`, `'small'`, `'compact'` | `default` | | | `text` | The text displayed on the bar | `string` | | | | `text-color` | The text color | `string` | `#FFFFFF` (Trimble White) | | | `value` | The progress value | `number` | `0` | | ### Accessibility - Progress Bar has `role` of `progressbar`. - Progress Bar gets an `aria-label` provided by the `aria-label` property input. - Progress Bar gets an `aria-maxvalue` provided by the `max-value` property input. - Progress Bar gets an `aria-minvalue` provided by the `min-value` property input. - Progress Bar gets an `aria-valuenow` set to the current value. - Progress Bar in `indeterminate` mode has `aria-valuetext`,`aria-maxvalue` and `aria-minvalue` set to `null`.

examples:
<modus-progress-bar
    aria-label=${ariaLabel}
    background-color=${backgroundColor}
    color=${color}
    max-value=${maxValue}
    mode=${mode}
    min-value=${minValue}
    size=${size}
    text=${text}
    text-color=${textColor}
    value=${value}>
  </modus-progress-bar>

<modus-progress-bar
    aria-label=${ariaLabel}
    background-color=${backgroundColor}
    color=${color}
    max-value=${maxValue}
    mode=${mode}
    min-value=${minValue}
    size=${size}
    text=${text}
    text-color=${textColor}
    value=${value}>
  </modus-progress-bar>
